name: v25.11.1
body:
## 
* Action: Upload arm64 artifacts too.  by @HeyMeco in [armbian/linux-rockchip#423](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/423)
* Actions: Disable merge-announce workflow on forks.  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/build#8907](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8907)
* Add AM62P Starter Kit Support.  by @Grippy98 in [armbian/build#8624](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8624)
* Add Armbian support for NanoPi R76S.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/build#8586](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8586)
* Add best practices for system upgrades.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/configng#676](https://github.com/armbian/configng/pull/676)
* Add Board: Radxa Rock-4D.  by @HeyMeco in [armbian/linux-rockchip#391](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/391)
* Add CERTPATH environment variable to workflow.  by @efectn in [armbian/armbian.github.io#76](https://github.com/armbian/armbian.github.io/pull/76)

* add description for .conf.  by @EvilOlaf in [armbian/build#8847](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8847)

* add dts for r58-4x4.  by @150balbes in [armbian/linux-rockchip#403](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/403)
* Add files via upload.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/armbian.github.io#77](https://github.com/armbian/armbian.github.io/pull/77)
* add firmwares for radxa dragon q6a.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/firmware#115](https://github.com/armbian/firmware/pull/115)
* add initial support of NanoPi M5.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/build#8651](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8651)
* add NanoPi R76S support for edge kernel builds.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/build#8609](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8609)
* add new board radxa-cm4-io.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/build#8604](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8604)
* add new board radxa-e54c.  by @kamilsaigol in [armbian/build#8849](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8849)

* Add PWM configuration to rk3506b-armsom-forge1.dts.  by @as-jackson in [armbian/linux-rockchip#420](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/420)
* Add Radxa Rock 4D and Rockchip UFS support.  by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8570](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8570)
* add redirect for https://docs.armbian.com/User-Guide_Allwinner_overlays/.  by @leggewie in [armbian/documentation#803](https://github.com/armbian/documentation/pull/803)
* add rk3506 ddr and tee blobs.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/rkbin#39](https://github.com/armbian/rkbin/pull/39)

* Add rk3528_ddr_ddr3_lpdr3_780MHz_v1.11.bin.  by @coolsnowwolf in [armbian/rkbin#37](https://github.com/armbian/rkbin/pull/37)

* Add some stuff for NanoPi R76S.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/os#369](https://github.com/armbian/os/pull/369)
* add support for 9tripod x3568 v4.  by @rbqvq in [armbian/firmware#116](https://github.com/armbian/firmware/pull/116)
* add support for Bananapi M5 Pro board.  by @efectn in [armbian/build#8640](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8640)
* Add support for Forky.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/os#393](https://github.com/armbian/os/pull/393)
* Add support for Hardkernel ODROID M1S.  by @Jojo-A in [armbian/build#8846](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8846)

* Add support for Qualcomm serial (qcserial) and CDC MBIM (cdc_mbim) XpressReal-T3.  by @aalaei in [armbian/build#8663](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8663)
* Add support for XpressReal T3.  by @wei633 in [armbian/build#8557](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8557)
* Add type of bootable fs for ODroid-N2 into board config.  by @iav in [armbian/build#8927](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8927)
* Add Ubuntu 25.10 and 26.04 as csc build target, Bookworm to csc.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8932](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8932)
* Add user-friendly tool for interacting with Qualcomm devices.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/os#389](https://github.com/armbian/os/pull/389)
* Add warning for rockchip uboot on modern hosts.  by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8783](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8783)
* Add wget to prepare-host.sh.  by @HeyMeco in [armbian/build#8779](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8779)

* add zstd and lzo as zram compression to meson64 current and edge configs.  by @Migelo in [armbian/build#8767](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8767)
* Added new kde-plasma-mobile environment for trixie.  by @Squishy123 in [armbian/build#8769](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8769)
* Adding Mecotronic R58 HD.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/linux-rockchip#401](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/401)
* Adds support for the NanoPi-M5 board.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/os#374](https://github.com/armbian/os/pull/374)
* allow BTRFS to be built as module.  by @tabrisnet in [armbian/build#8561](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8561)
* allow building a minimal btrfs compressed image.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/build#8751](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8751)

* AR-2758 : fix libwmf0.2-7-gtk bad name.  by @Eyolon in [armbian/build#8669](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8669)
* arch/arm64/boot/dts/rockchip/rk3576-armsom-sige5.dts: leds fix.  by @as-jackson in [armbian/linux-rockchip#390](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/390)
* arch: arm: dts: add armsom forge1 support.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/linux-rockchip#398](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/398)
* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Lyra Plus (RK3506g2).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#411](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/411)
* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Lyra Plus (RK3506g2).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#415](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/415)

* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Lyra Zero W.  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#405](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/405)
* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Lyra Zero W (RK3506).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#408](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/408)
* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Pico Mini (RV1103).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#414](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/414)
* arch: arm: dts: add Luckfox Pico Mini (RV1103) + rv1106 OP-TEE.  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#409](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/409)
* arch: arm: dts: fix filename of forge1 display dtsi.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/linux-rockchip#407](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/407)
* arch: arm: dts: Luckfox Pico Pro/Max (RV1106).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#412](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/412)
* arch: arm: dts: Luckfox Pico Pro/Max (RV1106).  by @vidplace7 in [armbian/linux-rockchip#417](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/417)
* arch: arm: dts: rename rk3506-armsom-forge1.dts to rk3506b-armsom-forge1.dts.  by @amazingfate in [armbian/linux-rockchip#406](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/406)
* arm64: dts: rockchip: add radxa-e54c.  by @kamilsaigol in [armbian/linux-rockchip#413](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/413)
* arm64: dts: rockchip: add support for BananaPi M5 Pro.  by @efectn in [armbian/linux-rockchip#399](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/399)

* Armbian install progress bar wasn't working for awhile.  by @igorpecovnik in [armbian/build#8900](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8900)

* armbian-kernel: remove inconsistent conditionals.  by @rpardini in [armbian/build#8820](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8820)

* Beagle kernel config.  by @glneo in [armbian/build#8913](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8913)
* blobs: rk3576: update BL31 to v1.20 and DDR to v1.09.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/build#8596](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8596)

* board: NanoPi M5 add initial support.  by @SuperKali in [armbian/linux-rockchip#400](https://github.com/armbian/linux-rockchip/pull/400)
